main.description: Signs a PLC operation to update some value(s) in the requesting DID's document.

signingKey.description: The new signing key, formatted as a `did:key`. Normally provided by the service that the account is migrating to.

rotationKeys.description: An array of rotation keys, formatted as `did:key`s, ordered by highest to least authority. Normally provided by the service that the account is migrating to.

pdsEndpoint.description: The endpoint for the PDS that an account is migrating to. Note that this will be reflected in the DID doc as provided and therefore should include the protocol scheme (`https://`).
